definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

pinyin: dan1 he2 xi4 bao1 zeng1 duo1 zheng4

sentences.english: Objeective To summarize the clinical of infectious mononucleosis(IM) in adult patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析傳染性單核細胞增多症的臨牀特徵及治療。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the clinical characteristics of infectious mononucleosis in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結兒童傳染性單核細胞增多症的臨牀特點。

sentences.english: Specifically, the researchers used bone-marrow-derived mononuclear cells.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，研究者是使用了從骨髓中萃取出來的單核細胞。

sentences.english: That suggested that if the receptor is not active, the monocytes will not be released.
sentences.chinese: 這表明，如果受體不活化，單核細胞將無法釋放。

sentences.english: Specifically, the researchers used bone-marrow-derived mononuclear cells.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，研究者是使用了從骨髓中萃取出來的單核細胞。
